hibernate-mapping.query: DELETE FROM TimesResourcesExclusion timesResourcesExclusion WHERE timesResourcesExclusion.id.timeId = :timeId AND timesResourcesExclusion.id.resourceId = :resourceId
DELETE FROM RestrictedTimesRoles restrictedTimesRoles WHERE restrictedTimesRoles.id.timeId = :timeId
hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT A.TIME_ID||NVL(D.ROLE_ID, '') compKey, A.TIME_ID timeId, A.TIME_TYPE timeType, A.START_DATE startDate, A.START_TIME startTime, A.END_DATE endDate, A.END_TIME endTime, A.DESCRIPTION description, A.SYSTEM_NAME systemName, B.ROLE_ID roleId, C.RESOURCE_ID resourceId, D.ROLE_ID timesExclusionRoles FROM RESTRICTED_TIMES A LEFT OUTER JOIN RESTRICTED_TIMES_ROLES B ON A.TIME_ID = B.TIME_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN RESTRICTED_TIMES_RESOURCES C ON A.TIME_ID = C.TIME_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TIMES_RESOURCES_EXCLUSION D ON A.TIME_ID = D.TIME_ID AND C.RESOURCE_ID = D.RESOURCE_ID
